name: Shining Blade
description:
Warning: This game is not finished yet, it's a demo now.

Side-Scrolling Platformer Action.

The adventure of a hero destroying evil enemies,
Accomplish extraordinary achievements through constant adventures.

Attack methods:
Use weapons to get different attack methods
Melee, Throw, Shoot, Boom.

Auxiliary skills:
Blink - Short distance transmission
Block - Block the movement of the enemy

Equipment:
Increase hero values,
Rune - 8 attributes to enhance different abilities, such as strength to enhance life.
Exclusive - Exclusives of the same type will accumulate the equipment value.
Artifact - Increase the basic attributes according to the percentage.

Enemies:
Cute poultry, ferocious beasts, evil zombies, and more.
Kill various enemies to gain money and experience.

Explore:
Explore the map and search for equipment, gems, and more.
Sometimes you need to make your own choices, destroy obstacles or detours, fight or be friendly.
In certain areas, there will be powerful seals that limit your abilities and use your way to pass the test.
